I am an Assistant Professor of Chemistry at Fresno State. Much of my research has been in organic synthesis of natural products as well as isotopically-reinforced sterols involved in peroxidation. I teach undergraduate and graduate courses in organic chemistry.

=======

I am Assistant Professor of Chemistry at Fresno State. Much of my research has been in organic synthesis of natural products as well as isotopically-reinforced sterols involved in peroxidation. I teach undergraduate and graduate courses in organic chemistry. See my detailed CV for details.
